ygData.subject: Re: Hail
ygData.msgSnippet: You can get bronze weapons from Gnoll Nobles and Dervishes, much better than the tarnished sword.  You can also shell out about 5 pp for a regular sword.  I
ygData.messageBody:
You can get bronze weapons from Gnoll Nobles and Dervishes,
much better than the tarnished sword. You can also shell out
about 5 pp for a regular sword. I paid 5pp for my Broadsword
and it works much better than the rusty and tarnished versions
(almost 1 more in damage and -2 in delay).

Angarth, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:34 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Hail
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> Hail Warriors,
>
> I am a 6'6" Barbarian Warrior Princess of the 11th circle currently
> wandering Clan Crushbone in an effort to rid the world of Orcs. I am
> looking for better armor or weapons. I am wearing all leather (and I
> feels
> good) and using a tarnished longsword with a shield. Looking forward to
> the
> day I am weilding two longswords and I can kill orcs quicker.
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
